attributes.action:
We need a General Election Now !!
Let the people decide
attributes.additional_details:
Labour don’t want an Election why ?? 
Parliament and British Politics is in deadlock, we need to move things on !!  
Parliament isn’t sitting so it’s a great time to fight an election .  If Labour win they can try and get an EU deal and follow through their beliefs on Brexit !!  So let’s have a vote this country needs a resolution
attributes.background: To end this deadlock in Parliament we need an Election now.  Let the people decide not Parliament
